name: Placeholder the game
description:
Placeholder - is a puzzle platformer game. The game holds it's place in a strange rooms with different puzzles.

Features:

1. 20 levels. Every single one of them contains different unique mechanics

2. Multiple languages: English, Russian

3. Save system.

4. Handmade assets: music, graphics, etc.

5. Hints! So you won't get stuck on the level

6. Challenging levels, some of them can be really difficult gameplaywise
